text: RT @Sifill_LDF Try putting a 55cent stamp on your Fed Ex letter, see where it gets you. The Postal Service is not designed make Billions. It’s a “service” - a public service. Public libraries could also just sell books and make lots of money. The ourpose is not to make tax revenue. https://twitter.com/amuse/status/1249359264566726657 QT @amuse USPS, FedEx, and UPS are basically the same size, but the USPS pays no taxes and costs the taxpayers billions each year. What if we just let the USPS shutter and let FedEx and UPS pick up the slack? We could make BILLIONS more in tax revenue year from them. https://twitter.com/Sifill_LDF/status/1249332960651862016 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVadjz-XgAAsZe3.jpg

Today I’m thinking about the families across our nation who are having their first holiday without their uncle, their grandma, their dad, or other loved one because they lost them to coronavirus. May they be able to find strength and healing in community and love.

Senator Rubio and his family wish a blessed #Easter to all those celebrating on this joyful day. May the spirit of the celebration bring peace and hope to you and your families. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVGdfqdWsAAw2aM.jpg

A powerful message from Pope Francis this Easter morning. Let us use this moment in time to become a #BuilderOfChange, refocus on the common good, and put "human life and dignity at the centre" of all that we do→ http://faithinaction.org/letter-from-the-pope-to-popular-movements

He is risen!

Heidi and I would like to wish to you and your families a wonderful and blessed Easter. #HappyEaster http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1249319353855729666/pu/img/D6MM7EqdiRFaQ1oS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1249319353855729666/pu/vid/320x568/xNL7Rl4hcZrY54MT.mp4?tag=10

Some “mom& pop” #smallbiz think they can’t get #PPP because they need solid payroll records. Not true!

Borrower calculates on application & lender can rely on borrowers representation. But will need records of how you spent loan to receive forgiveness

https://home.treasury.gov/system/files/136/Paycheck-Protection-Program-Frequently-Asked-Questions.pdf

Easter may be a little different this year than others, but I hope you get the chance to be virtually close to your loved ones today. Let us all remember that even when things seem dark, there is always reason for hope. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVaAqLgWsAEzULz.jpg
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVapiAwWsAA1XdQ.jpg

Happy Easter Sunday!

Today, I’m remembering some of the lessons I learned in Sunday school at McFarlin Methodist Church in Oklahoma: By doing good and acting in service to one another, we can live a righteous life.

Things are tough right now. But what makes me hopeful this Easter Sunday is all the good we see people doing for one another. Now more than ever, I believe in the value of every single person – & our righteous fights to protect the least of my brethren. Have a happy & safe day. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D4r-A8GWAAEjMtt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/999658854781767680/vid/320x180/ISE55a7xMG-5bpsz.mp4?tag=2

He is risen! While Easter services will look different this year, we will celebrate from our homes with praise and profound appreciation for the greatest gift, the greatest miracle, and the greatest sacrifice: Jesus Christ, the Son of God, lives!

RT @SenTedCruz He is risen!

Heidi and I would like to wish to you and your families a wonderful and blessed Easter. #HappyEaster http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1249319353855729666/pu/img/D6MM7EqdiRFaQ1oS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1249319353855729666/pu/vid/320x568/xNL7Rl4hcZrY54MT.mp4?tag=10

We may not be gathered in person today, but that doesn't mean we can't be close in spirit. In the midst of these difficult times, Easter brings a welcome sense of renewal and an eternal hope for our future. I wish you and your loved ones a safe and healthy holiday.

El senador Rubio y su familia les desean unas bendecidas pascuas a todos los que celebran este día tan alegre. Que el espíritu de la celebración les traiga paz y esperanza a ustedes y a su familia. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVGdfqdWoAYtdGh.jpg

Wishing a Happy Easter Sunday to all who celebrate. In this difficult time for so many, I pray we all take time today, and in the days ahead, to reflect on the enduring power of hope, renewal and redemption, and that we choose to use every moment to be a force for good.

RT @Franklin_Graham When that Sunday morning dawned, history was turned inside out. The news—Jesus is alive!—was almost too good to be true. Yet it was undeniably true. On the cross, Jesus Christ died for our sins. In the tomb, He defeated death. #HappyEaster
Wishing you all a #HappyEaster! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVafJoyWoAA2Ynl.jpg

RT @RepAOC There will be a new portal on the IRS website this week where you can check the status of your cash assistance & set up direct deposit.  If you were not required to file a federal tax return in 2018 or 2019 then you can sign up for direct deposit here now: https://www.irs.gov/coronavirus/non-filers-enter-payment-info-here

RT @dougstafford This was left on people’s cars today if they attempted to attend church. The police don’t know if they were socially distancing and wearing masks. They literally just said you can go to Walmart but not to church, and they did it upon orders of @AndyBeshearKY http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVbakhtX0AA0_Xo.jpg

Watch: The incomparable @AndreaBocelli celebrates Easter singing Live from the Duomo di Milano.  Breathtaking. All of us need to hear this. Hope in this time of darkness. He is Risen. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=huTUOek4LgU&feature=youtu.be

A tragic loss. RIP. https://twitter.com/samwangphd/status/1249132655737790464 QT @SamWangPhD I am sorry to confirm the passing of my colleague John Conway. An incomparable mathematician, a pleasant neighbor, and an excellent coffee acquaintance. 

His passing was sudden (fever started only Wednesday morning). Part of coronavirus's hard toll in New Jersey.

Seven-year-old Cavanaugh Bell proves that no one is ever too young to be a leader.
https://twitter.com/CNN/status/1247018718946889730 QT @CNN At a time when senior citizens must stay in to avoid the coronavirus, this 7-year-old boy is helping them by making care packages.

He started by using his own money -- and then the donations started to roll in. https://trib.al/weqW1rJ

We cannot allow Donald Trump to use this horrific pandemic as an opportunity to bankrupt and privatize the Postal Service. Now, more than ever, we need a strong and vibrant postal system to deliver mail 6-days a week. Congress must act now to save it. https://www.commondreams.org/news/2020/04/11/postal-service-verge-collapse-and-630000-jobs-risk-trump-slammed-refusing-act

It is beyond insane that corporate hospital administrators gave nurses protective gear only after they were tested positive for coronavirus.

We need emergency labor standards and swift enforcement to protect our frontline medical workers NOW. https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2020/04/11/amid-chaos-anguished-nurses-say-pennsylvania-hospital-risked-infecting-cancer-patients-babies-staff/

Last week, I called for a suspension of credit card interest, fees, and penalties because no one should profit off of those who are hurting in the midst of this pandemic. https://medium.com/@SenKamalaHarris/people-are-hurting-suspend-credit-card-interest-fees-and-penalties-aefa1947eef0

#ResurrectionDay 

“When Simon Peter arrived after him,he went into the tomb & saw the burial cloths there,& the cloth that had covered his head,not with the burial cloths but rolled up in a separate place.Then the other disciple also went in...& he saw & believed.”

John 20:6-8 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVafB-6XkAE3XBW.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVafB-5XkAE87sz.jpg

In times of disaster, Texans unite to help one another. I’m proud of the work Feed the Front Line Texas is doing to help feed #TX healthcare workers while keeping local restaurants open. 

Click here to learn more about http://ftfltexas.org and how to support them.

As I count it, that’s $11k right there.... https://twitter.com/ahmalcolm/status/1249220360689430529 QT @AHMalcolm Michigan governor signs measure setting $1,000 fine for citizens who fail to keep a 6-foot social distance. But....... http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVYfRZ4UMAACZET.jpg

RT @EconomistRadio “There’s not an area of our society that I don’t see being affected by the economic crisis combined with this health crisis.” Senator @CoryBooker talks to @AnneMcElvoy about life at the epicentre of America’s coronavirus crisis on “The Economist Asks” https://www.economist.com/podcasts/2020/04/02/can-america-unite-to-fight-the-virus?fsrc=scn/tw/te/bl/ed/canamericaunitetofightthevirustheeconomistaskscorybooker&linkId=100000011637383 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EVA7QGTWkAAfqI-.png https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1247562219853938688/pu/vid/320x320/9Dh7kvZKn_Kj7wQi.mp4?tag=10
Thrilled to hear that @BorisJohnson has gotten out from hospital. Wishing him a continued speedy recovery! Get well soon. 🇺🇸 🇬🇧

It's important to hold onto moments of joy in the midst of these difficult days. Wishing everyone renewed hope and happiness this Easter Sunday!

My tip for those celebrating away from loved ones: call or video chat instead of text—it's so much better to hear people's voices.

The Otay Mesa immigration detention center in San Diego now has the most COVID-19 cases of any detention facility. DHS has failed to take sufficient action to protect vulnerable people in these facilities. That needs to change—now. https://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/news/immigration/story/2020-04-12/coronavirus-spread-in-otay-mesa-detention-center

Do not be afraid! I know that you are seeking Jesus the crucified.
He is not here,for he has been raised just as he said. Come & see the place where he lay....He has been raised from the dead & he is going before you to Galilee; there you will see him.

Matthew 28:5-7
COVID es un evento traumático.  Debemos hacer serias inversiones para el cuidado mental de nuestrxs trabajadorxs de primera línea.

Solo esta semana, Nueva York ha perdido más vidas que las que se perdieron el 9/11.

Yo he estado en el teléfono toda la semana con enfermeras llorando, ayudantes de la salud, trabajadorxs de bodegas, y trabajadores de primera línea. https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1249019500336480257 QT @nowthisnews This nurse opened up about her 'worst shift' yet, exposing the heartbreaking reality of health care workers fighting the pandemic http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1249017184925503493/img/mPxyKZ5TQqwF9mcu.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1249017184925503493/vid/320x320/HDWZK4OzW6E9uahK.mp4?tag=13
